message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more upfront, but we both walk away with something good.
I think we can do better than that, Alice. I'll take the bigger share this time.
Okay, Bob, let's be reasonable.  I'll take a little less than my first offer, but this has to be fair for both of us.
Come on, Alice, the money is losing value fast. I need a bigger share to make up for it.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  We're both losing money. Take this deal before it gets even worse for both of us.
